In particular, this book is designed for individuals who are new to the universe of hacking and entrance testing, for those with practically zero past experience, for the individuals who are baffled by the failure to see the master plan (how the different instruments and stages fit together), or for those hoping to learn hacking secrets and extend their insight into hostile security.
